participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.
